entry.title: Goals for 2025
entry.content:
As of writing this post (2025-07-29), more than half of the year has passed.
Probably not the best time to be making a post named "Goals for YYYY".
Nonetheless, here we are.

At the end of the year, I'll revisit this post and reflect on how I did.

Priority

  1. Read "The Little Schemer".
  2. Read "... Data Structures and Algorithms" by Jay Wengrow.
  3. Read "Book of Proof" by Richard Hammack.
  4. Write a blog post on a topic from Linear Algebra.
  5. Throw a party for kid's birthday.
  6. Go to a tech conference.
  7. Squat 100 kg
  8. Deadlift 120 kg

Optional

  1. Read parts of "Elementary Linear Algebra" by Howard Anton
  2. Read "C Programming Language".
  3. Read "Demian" by Herman Hesse
  4. Read "Lessons in Fundamentals of Go" by Kageyama
